  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput.SecureInputBuilder
    Will be removed future major release, the replacement interface is SecureInputBuilderV2
    com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput.SecurePinpadListener
    Will be removed future major release, the replacement interface is SecurePinpadListenerV2
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.gemalto.idp.mobile.ui.secureinput.SecureInputConstant
    Will be removed in future major release, the replacement class is SecureInputDefaultSettings

  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    com.gemalto.idp.mobile.core.devicefingerprint.DeviceFingerprintSource.Type.SERVICE
    Since Mobile Protector SDK v4.9.2 this type is deprecated. For new token created, if this type is used then it will be ignored. For old token, this type will still be used only for the migration.
